name: P2P-network-with-Node.js
description: A simple peer-to-peer WebRTC service with Node.js

scripts.node1: ADDRESS=localhost HTTP_PORT=5000 P2P_PORT=8080 npm run dev
scripts.node2: ADDRESS=localhost HTTP_PORT=5001 P2P_PORT=8081 TARGET_PEER=localhost:8080 npm run dev
